TopicTitle: And so I'm back, from a forum reset no less!

Articles.Content:
I wander away from the KSP forums for a couple months and come back to find them reset?! That's crazy.

I'm happy to see that the forums are alive and kicking, even if they did suffer an unfortunate roll-back.

Squad is the best at space and I hope they keep it up!

Welcome back to the community csiler2

I little thing like faulty backups cant hurt Squad, all the KSP code was on a git repository, nice and safe

Amen, Sal.

Honestly, sometimes it's nice to have a little clean out, even if it's unintentional.

I'm so excited about where the game is going. Squad does great work!
